At Mike Pence Will Not Run for Barack Obama Indiana announced Thursday that he would not be a Republican candidate for president in 2012, but he left the door open to running for governor. In the choice between seeking national office and serving Indiana in some capacity, we choose Indiana, Mr. Mike Pence wrote in a letter to supporters.`` We will not seek the Republican nomination for president in 2012.'' David Cameron said that he was very sorry that Andy Coulson has decided to resign as my director of communications. `` Andy Coulson has told me that the focus on him was impeding his ability to do his job and was starting to prove a distraction for the government,'' Mr. David Cameron said in a statement, which

was starting to prove a distraction for the government.'' In comments to BSkyB's Sky News television channel, David Cameron dismissed questioning about his judgment over Andy Coulson .` Excellent Job' He's run the Downing Street press office in a professional, competent and good way, David Cameron told Sky.`` He's done an excellent, excellent job. I think he should be judged by that. This is all about the past. It's just gone on and on.''
